body.p:
To His Excellency Beriah Magoffin, Governor of Kentucky.
Dear Sir
According to your suggestion, I write you in furtherance of my solicitation from you -- of an appointment of Notary Public.
I am a graduate of the Law Department of the University of Louisville, and am practicing Law here. Hoping you will give this your considerance -- I am

Your obedient servant,
Joseph M. Rogers

P. S. I understand -- although I see nothing in the statutes to that Effect -- that it is necessary to send certificates, which are Enclosed.
Jefferson Co

Jefferson Co
Notary
Jos. M. Rogers
